enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Reserved for students who are currently enrolled in or have taken and passed STAT 320-1.
title: WCAS STAT 320-2-20 Statistical Methods

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Course Description:

We will use the probability theory developed in Statistics 320-1 to discuss statistical theory and applications. Topics include survey sampling, parameter estimation, confidence interval calculation, and hypothesis testing.

Prerequisites:

Statistics 202 or 210, and Statistics 320-1

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Homework, a midterm and a final.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Text (required): Mathematical Statistics and Data Analysis, 3rd edition, by John A. Rice

subject: STAT
